alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 2:13PM MDT until July 05 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHARLES MIX...BON HOMME...YANKTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 312 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mayfield to near Tyndall to near Niobrara, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 257 PM CDT, a 64 mph wind gust was reported in Tyndall. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Mayfield around 315 PM CDT. Tabor around 320 PM CDT. Irene, Volin and Utica around 325 PM CDT. Lewis And Clark State Recreation Area around 330 PM CDT. Yankton around 335 PM CDT. Mission Hill around 340 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Gayville, Lesterville and southern Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Hutchinson; Yankton
